function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of assessment of the contribution of urban green space to wellbeing","Impact":"Inability to recognize the potential positive impact of urban green space on wellbeing","Mitigation":"Conduct comprehensive assessments to understand the contribution of urban green space to wellbeing","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools, survey methods","People":"Urban planners, public health officials, researchers","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies"},{"Description":"Limited studies on the impact of domestic gardens on psychosocial factors and physical health during lockdown","Impact":"Lack of understanding of the potential benefits of domestic gardens on health during lockdown","Mitigation":"Conduct studies to investigate the impact of domestic gardens on psychosocial factors and physical health during lockdown","Technologies":"Data collection tools, surveys, observational studies","People":"Researchers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Potential lack of information on protective behaviors for prevention of psychiatric disorders during self-isolation","Impact":"Insufficient knowledge about protective behaviors for prevention of psychiatric disorders during self-isolation","Mitigation":"Conduct observational studies to identify protective behaviors and inform public health strategies","Technologies":"Observational studies, data collection tools, surveys","People":"Public health researchers, mental health professionals","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
